articles.title: Swollen lymph nodes: A COVID-19 vaccine side effect that's normal - Cosmopolitan UK
articles.description: People shouldn't automatically assume swollen lymph nodes are related to cancer.

articles.title: Obesity's Role In Severe COVID-19 Cases Complicates Vaccine Rollout : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: In the U.S. South — home to nine of the nation's 12 heaviest states — obesity is playing a role not only in COVID-19 outcomes but in the calculus of the vaccination rollout.
